Package com.bbtutorials.users.controller

Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
com.bbtutorials.users.controller.AccountController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/")
public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
The class used as the REST controller for accounts (and friends). The AccountDao object is autowired in as a singleton to ensure the proper credentials are used each time an API is called. For more information on the specific API calls, see the AccountDao class. This class mainly serves as the HTTP API gateway and logger.
